title: Chapter 4529 - Chapter 4529: In The Fear Of The Four Great Experts
body:
Chapter 4529 - Chapter 4529: In The Fear Of The Four Great Experts

Chapter 4529: In the fear of the four great experts

“I don’t know what kind of attack I have suffered. The life force in my body is rapidly disappearing. An extremely terrifying energy is continuously corroding my body!”

“Quick, inject the energy into my body and help me get rid of this strange energy!”

There was a trace of fear on the disaster Lord’s face as he hurriedly shouted at the other three primal chaos existences.

This strange attack caused him to be unable to react in time.

Ever since he broke through to the primal chaos realm, this was the first time he had encountered such a terrifying attack.

“Alright.”

The other three primal chaos existences from the evil sequence faction didn’t hesitate at all as they immediately injected waves of energy into his body!

“I can sense it! !”

The three powerhouses immediately sensed the strange energy in his body and wrapped it with energy to stop it!

“Huh?”

At the same time, in the sky above the Dragon Palace, Wang Xian sensed that his curse was being resisted. A smile appeared on his face.

“It’s just delaying the time of death by an hour!”

Wang Xian did not mind. A smile appeared on his face.

At this moment, even if they were to join forces, they weren’t his match. Furthermore, Wang Xian was going all out to deal with one of them.

Even if they were to help him defend, they wouldn’t be able to withstand it.

This was because the terrifying attack of the cursed demon spirit was indeed strange!

“How is this possible? We can’t get rid of this energy at all. Even if the four of US join forces, we can’t Stop It!”

At this moment, sword demon axe and the others revealed terrified expressions.

They injected all of their energy into the Lord of Disaster’s body.

They could sense that strange energy.

However, they couldn’t get rid of it.

They could only delay the attack of this cursed power, but they couldn’t completely get rid of this cursed power.

“Impossible, how is this possible? Even with your help, it would only prolong the time of death of my body for an hour. What kind of curse is this?”

The Lord of disaster could not help but roar in horror!

“It must be that Dragon King who obtained a powerful treasure and used it to curse you, Lord of Disaster!”

The old man wearing the bamboo hat roared in a low voice with a solemn expression!

“Damn it!”

A cold expression appeared on the Lord of Disaster’s face.

His body shook, and his incomparably savage face broke free from his black mist-like body!

It was as if he was giving up on stripping off his body!

After his face was stripped off, the black mist-like body quickly lost its vitality.

“Damn Dragon King of the Dragon Palace, he made me suffer such heavy losses. I want to drink his blood and eat his flesh!”

The Lord of disaster roared with killing intent.

“The Dragon Palace is stronger than we thought. They have more than one chaos-level existence.”

Axe sword demon said solemnly!

“Ah!”

“What? The power of the curse has been transferred to my current body. Not Good!”

However, at this moment, the Lord of Disaster’s scream sounded once again.

This caused the expressions of the other three primal chaos experts to change slightly.

“How is this possible? Lord of Disaster, your great life fog transfer technique can transfer all injuries. How can it be attacked again?”

The expressions of the others changed drastically as they spoke!

“I can only hold on for five minutes. Kill that Dragon King. Kill him. Only by killing him can I stop this curse.”

The Lord of Disaster Roared in fear!

“Do it, do it, do it now!”

He gritted his teeth and immediately flew toward the Dragon Palace!

The expressions of axe sword demon and the other chaos-level experts changed, and they immediately followed behind.

Do It!

Do It Now!

The Lord of disaster was currently under a terrifying attack, and he could only hold on for five minutes.

They had to inflict heavy losses on the Dragon Palace within these five minutes. They had to even destroy the Dragon King!

Boom! Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

The Lord of disaster took the lead and flew over. His body carried an extremely terrifying aura.

His extremely hideous face stared at Wang Xian.

“Die!”

The monstrous demonic aura and the suffocating bloody aura condensed into countless hideous faces. They opened their mouths wide and attacked Wang Xian like devils from hell!

“Accelerating death?”

Wang Xian looked at him with a mocking and disdainful expression.

If the four of them were to join forces, it would take him some time to kill them.

However, if one of them were to attack him alone, he would be courting death!

Buzz

Wang Xian’s body trembled and his time domain spread out in all directions.

Before the Lord of Calamity’s attack could reach him…

Wang Xian had already arrived in front of him.

Boom

The power of chaos transformed into pure light power and headed straight for the Lord of Calamity!

“What?”

The Lord of Calamity’s expression changed drastically when he saw Wang Xian instantly appearing in front of him and seeing such a terrifying attack!

“Ahhhh!”

His extremely ferocious face seemed to have been torn apart.

A wisp of black fog teleported to the side.

The ferocious face that he had left behind was instantly erased by Wang Xian!

“What?”

Behind him, axe sword demon and the rest who were following closely behind saw this scene and their expressions changed drastically!

The Lord of Calamity, who had escaped with his powerful talent, had a face full of horror!

Although he was not in his peak condition, it was impossible for him to be so powerless to retaliate!

How was this possible?

“Buzz!”

However, before he could think too much, he saw the extremely terrifying dragon king in front of him, holding his own shadow in his hand.

He grabbed with all his might!

In the next instant, his body trembled violently. The feeling of impending death had descended!

“Weng!”

Purple energy bloomed on his body.

It formed the shape of a flower.

However, the moment the flower bloomed, it quickly withered.

This was the life-saving treasure of the Master of disaster.

Furthermore, it had been nurtured with powerful energy.

After being nurtured for countless years, it was sufficient for him to withstand the attacks of primal chaos realm experts.

However, the life-saving treasure that had been nurtured for countless years had dissipated in an instant.

Even though it had helped him to withstand the terrifying attack, it still made him extremely fearful!

“You have many tricks up your sleeve!”

Wang Xian looked at this scene and spoke indifferently.

However, the Phantom of the Lord of Calamity was still in front of him.

He grabbed at the Phantom once again!

When the Lord of calamity saw this scene, he was stunned!

At this moment, how could he not understand that the Phantom in front of the Dragon King was him.

He was under the control of the other party and could be easily crushed to death!

“Stop him!”

The Lord of Calamity roared at the other three chaos-level experts in the evil faction!

“Attack!”

The other three chaos-level existences in the evil faction also knew that the Lord of Calamity’s current situation wasn’t good, and the vast energy in their bodies boiled.
